SALESFORCE HELP

EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Add a Decision to a Personalization Point

A decision consists of targeting rules. The personalization point uses the decision to determine whether the individual who is engaging with your website or app is eligible to receive personalization content.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To add personalization decisions to personalization points:	

Create and Edit Personalization Points

Create and Edit Personalization Decisions

You can add multiple decisions to a personalization point. The order in which you create each decision initially determines its priority. The first decision created has the highest priority, followed by the next decision created, and so on. However, you can modify a decision’s priority at any time.

From the App Launcher, search for and select Personalization Points.
Open the personalization point that you want to add a decision to.

On the Related tab, click New.
Name the decision, select the recommender that you want to use, and click Next.
Specify the introduction text that visitors see for this personalized content, or accept the default text, and then click Next.
If the personalization point that you selected uses the Manual Content personalization type, define the manual content.
Specify the uniform resource locator (URL) for the background image that you want to use for this personalization.
Enter the header text that you want to appear on the background image and optional subheader text under the header.
Add call-to-action text, such as Click Here or Act Now, to prompt the visitor to click the personalization.
Provide a call-to-action URL that connects to more information, a page, or promotional content.
Click Next.
In the Targeting Rules window, specify when you want the personalized content to appear for visitors. By default, no targeting rules are applied to a decision.
OPTION	DESCRIPTION
Always (No Rules)	No targeting rules are applied, and all visitors are eligible to receive the personalized content.
All Rules Are Met	If all rules are met for a visitor, they’re eligible to receive the personalized content.
Any Rule Is Met	If any one of the rules is met for a visitor, they’re eligible to receive the personalized content.

You can create or modify targeting for the decision at any time. See Create a Targeting Rule.

Save your work.
SEE ALSO
Configure a Personalization Point
Create a Targeting Rule
Modify a Decision
